snippets.title: Galerie 3 Cards responsive
snippets.description: Une galerie avec 3 cards qui sont responsive
snippets.yaml:
- ctn_gal_:
    Control: GroupContainer
    Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
      Height: =Parent.Height
      LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
      LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
      LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
      Width: =Parent.Width
      X: =(Parent.Width-Self.Width)/2
      Y: =(Parent.Height-Self.Height)/2
    Children:
    - gal_:
        Control: Gallery
        Variant: BrowseLayout_Vertical_TwoTextOneImageVariant_ver5.0
        Properties:
          Items: =
          WrapCount: =3
          AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
          DelayItemLoading: =true
          Layout: =Layout.Vertical
          LoadingSpinner: =LoadingSpinner.Data
          ShowScrollbar: =false
          TemplatePadding: =10
          TemplateSize: =200
        Children:
        - ctn_card_horizontal:
            Control: GroupContainer
            Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
            Properties:
              Fill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
              Height: '=Parent.TemplateHeight '
              LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
              Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
            Children:
            - ctn_card_vertical:
                Control: GroupContainer
                Variant: verticalAutoLayoutContainer
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                  LayoutMinWidth: =0
                  LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto

snippets.title: Stepper avec Étapes
snippets.description:
Un composant Stepper affichant les étapes et leur état. 
 Il faut remplacer la valeur _VARIABLE_ par votre variable d'étape (int)
snippets.yaml:
- ctnSteper:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: ManualLayout
    Properties:
      AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.Regular
      FillPortions: =0
      Height: =125
      Width: =700
    Children:
      - galSteper:
          Control: Gallery@2.15.0
          Variant: Horizontal
          Properties:
            Height: =Parent.Height
            Items: =Table({Step:1,Name:"Step 1",Description:"Description"},{Step:2,Name:"Step 2",Description:"Description"},{Step:3,Name:"Step 3",Description:"Description"})
            TemplatePadding: =
            TemplateSize: =(Self.Width - (Self.TemplatePadding * (Self.AllItemsCount+1)))/Self.AllItemsCount
            Width: =Parent.Width
          Children:
            - ctnRec:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: ManualLayout
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(215, 58, 60, 1)
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                Children:
                  - recRight:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Height: =2
                        Visible: =If(ThisItem.Step = Last(Table({Step:1,Name:"Step 1",Description:"Description"},{Step:2,Name:"Step 2",Description:"Description"},{Step:3,Name:"Step 3",Description:"Description"})).Step,false,true)
                        Width: =Parent.Width/2 - ctnCircle.Width/2
                        X: =Parent.Width/2 + ctnCircle.Width/2
                        Y: =recLeft.Y
                  - recLeft:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Height: =2
                        Visible: =If(ThisItem.Step > 1,true,false)
                        Width: =Parent.Width/2 - ctnCircle.Width/2
                        Y: =ctnCircle.Y + ctnCircle.Height/2 - Self.Height/2
            - Container9:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Self.PaddingTop - Self.PaddingBottom
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                  LayoutGap: =10
                  PaddingBottom: =5
                  PaddingTop: =5
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                  X: =(Parent.TemplateWidth-Self.Width)/2
                  Y: =(Parent.TemplateHeight-Self.Height)/2
                Children:
                  - ctnCircle:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: ManualLayout
                      Properties:
                        AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Center
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        FillPortions: =0
                        Height: =40
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                        Width: =40
                      Children:
                        - imgSteperImg:
                            Control: Image@2.2.3
                            Properties:
                              Fill: =Color.Transparent
                              Height: =40
                              Image: "=If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,\"#.#\")),_VARIABLE), \"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, \"&EncodeUrl(\"<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 26 26' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='13' cy='13' r='12' fill='#003da5' stroke='#003da5' stroke-width='2'/></svg>\"), \"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, \"&EncodeUrl(\"<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 26 26' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='13' cy='13' r='12' stroke='#101014' stroke-width='2'/></svg>\"))"
                              Width: =40
                        - ctnStepNum:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              Font: =Font.'Lato Black'
                              FontColor: '=If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), Color.White,Color.Black)'
                              Height: =Parent.Height
                              Text: =ThisItem.Step
                              VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Middle
                              Width: =Parent.Width
                  - Container5:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: AutoLayout
                      Properties:
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                        LayoutMinHeight: =0
                        LayoutMinWidth: =0
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                      Children:
                        - lblSteperName:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              FillPortions: =1
                              FontColor: =If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), ColorValue("#003da5"),Color.Black)
                              Height: =45
                              LayoutMinHeight: =0
                              LayoutMinWidth: =galSteper.TemplateWidth
                              Size: =13
                              Text: =ThisItem.Name
                              VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Middle
                              Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                              Width: =200
                        - lblSteperDescription:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              FillPortions: =1
                              FontColor: =If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), ColorValue("#003da5"),Color.Black)
                              Height: =45
                              LayoutMinHeight: =0
                              LayoutMinWidth: =galSteper.TemplateWidth
                              PaddingTop: =5
                              Size: =11
                              Text: =ThisItem.Description
                              Width: =200
